author: Tom Nicholas
description:
Go to https://hensonshaving.com/tomnicholas and enter "TOMNICHOLAS" at checkout to get 100 free blades with your purchase.

A video about "context collapse" and how it's made all our political conversations deeply frustrating. And perhaps worse.

Written, directed and presented by Tom Nicholas.
Edited by Georgia Burrows.
Production support by Jack Carter.

Watch this video ad- and sponsor-free on Nebula at https://nebula.tv/videos/tomnicholas-why-political-debates-suck-now

Support my work on Patreon at https://patreon.com/tomnicholas

*Chapters*
00:00 I Don't Know What My Role is Anymore
02:19 Part One: The Political Opinion-Haver Cube
07:05 Part Two: BeforetheFall.com
14:05 Part Three: Context Collapse Confusion
18:47 Part Four: Was Silence Not an Option?
24:01 Part Five: Leveraging Context Collapse
30:27 Part Six: The Crackdown
